channel.title: Presentation on Scrollan demo
channel.description: Recent content in Presentation on Scrollan demo

item.title: Easy to use
item.author: toshiki@protonmail.com (Zxorn)
item.description: To make Scrollan easy to use we have focused a lot of our attention on creating great examples and documentation.

item.title: Versatile
item.author: toshiki@protonmail.com (Zxorn)
item.description: Regardless what technology you have built your web site with, you can use Scrollan to enhance the user experience.

item.title: Robust
item.author: toshiki@protonmail.com (Zxorn)
item.description: Software that looks good and provides value to users is nothing with being robust, that’s why we prioritize robustness over new features.

item.title: Demo & documentation
item.author: toshiki@protonmail.com (Zxorn)
item.description: To give you a demonstration of how Scrollan works and how you can use it, we've setup this Bootstrap 4 blog template (based on this template) as an example. Try scrolling around on this page and you'll see how Scrollan will render a progress indicator under the top menu and a headings menu to the left. While you read through the instructions on this page you'll notice how Scrollan helps you keep track of where you are in the content structure.
